actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill entitled "Office Machine Dealers Equity Act".
short_title: Office Machine and Equipment Dealers Equity Act

summary.text: Office Machine and Equipment Dealers Equity Act - Permits a dealer to sue a supplier for damages in Federal district court for violating the provisions of a dealer agreement. Requires such action to be brought within three years after the cause of action has accrued. States that this Act shall not be construed to modify any provision of the antitrust laws or to supersede any State law which provides additional or stronger standards than those in this Act.

titles.title: Office Machine and Equipment Dealers Equity Act
A bill entitled "Office Machine Dealers Equity Act".
